name: Adventure Field Regrade
description:
Adventure Field Regrade is a enhanced reimaged remake of the the original Adventure Field made by LilBen from WathitdewRecord.

This game still currently under development and in it's earliest stages. The current demo contains quite a few bugs, errors, and issues due to having it ready in time for the SGBSJ2022.

Any issues that you find please do not hesitate to leave a comment.
Note: the only difference between 0.05 and 0.05s are the spawn rates.
